name: European Publishers Council
memberOrga:
Members of the European Publishers Council can be found here:
http://epceurope.eu/about/our-values/
goal: The European Publishers Council (EPC) is a high level lobby group of Chairmen and Chief Executives of leading European media corporations. Our goal is to protect the freedom of expression in editorial and advertising content and to represent the business interests of EPC members. These span newspapers, magazines, books, journals, online database and internet publishing as well as in many cases interests in private television and radio.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Enterprise, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
